root.name: TerRover
root.description: TerRover is a physics based 2-D side scrolling adventure game. Its focus is traversing environments in an all terrain vehicle(rover) rather than defeating enemies. Terrain, environmental conditions, obstacles and gravity will change depending on what planet is being explored. Produced by Russian developer Creat Studios, TerRover was released on the Playstation Network on Sept. 7, 2010 to mostly negative reviews.
